snippet.title: Multiscale computer modeling in biomechanics and biomedical engineering
snippet.description: Multiscale computer modeling in biomechanics and biomedical engineering / Gefen, Amit (ed.) This book reviews the state-of-the-art in multiscale computer modeling, in terms of both accomplishments and challenges. [...] Berlin : Springer, 2013. (Studies in Mechanobiology Tissue Engineering and Biomaterials ; 14)

snippet.title: Myocardial Tissue Engineering
snippet.description: Myocardial Tissue Engineering / Boccaccini, Aldo R Myocardial tissue engineering (MTE), a concept that intends to prolong patients' life after cardiac damage by supporting or restoring heart function, is continuously improving [...] Dordrecht : Springer, 2011. - 271 p.
